Season 1's audio is weird. The background music can only be heard on left channel and dialogue+music on right channel.
I fixed it by changing the audio channel from dolby surround to right.
Works fine.
Thanks!!!
Also, I see only 5-6 people seeding indefinitely.
Others who finish downloading, for some reason don't seed. Please don't be that person.

The tail end of 4x10 (Chuck versus the Leftovers) has some audio/video sync problems. Something that can be fixed when season 5 is added?
